notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.M., J.J., V.S. and Z.G. performed essential oil isolation, established phytotoxic activity experiment and its evaluation; A.W.-B. performed GC-MS analysis; M.R. analyzed the data and performed statistical analysis; D.G. and J.P. conceived and designed the experiments, evaluated data and wrote the paper, D.K. provided project administration, consult data and wrote paper.
